heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Chance of snow from the Hudson Valley and Route 9 southward, and in far southern New Hampshire, with a to trace to 2 inches, again mainly near and south of the Massachusetts border. Lows from 10 to 20, north to south, except single digits northeast. Winds remaining light, variable, except from the north at 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly to mostly sunny. Highs mainly in the mid upper 30s, around 40 in southeastern valleys, and some lower 30s in the Champlain Valley, and near the international border. Light and variable winds in the south, light from the north in northern areas, except 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Partly to mostly cloudy. Chance of late-night snow near the Massachusetts birder. Lows from the upper teens to mid 20s in areas south of Route 4, 5 to 15 above in northern areas, with northeastern cold hollows from zero to 5 below. Winds becoming light and variable.
